task.summary: Implemented functionality to state if there are comments (new, old or none) on the 'display' function. 'read_post' is broken ATM.
Re-implemented and fixed up the 'read_post' functionality. This should roughly be it for 'pull' mode EXCEPT the code to process the arguments on startup to request pull mode.
Implemented timer to query for new comments (meant only for pull mode???).

Implemented an argument reader. Converted client so it has a thread to read input and send it, and a thread to receive requests, process and post to terminal (both act independent). Added a static variable which hold the list of object streams in the main class, accessible from any class to be used as the "push list".

Implemented the push functionality. Still not fully tested + when server is in PUSH mode, the server still sends out a read request (shouldn't do this). Also new posts keeps getting repeated (how to fix) when there are new posts at every interval.

Implemented timer to query for new comments (meant only for pull mode???).
